name: Globo Customer Service Chat
author: Giorgio Zamparelli

sections.description:
Integrate Globo Widget chat for seamless customer support on your WordPress site. Globo Support is a SaaS product for live chat.

How it works

  1. Powered by Globo Support: The globo widget chat plugin uses Globo Support’s Chat Widget feature to allow visitors to interact with wordpress sites and send queries to the site owners.
  2. Integration with the dashboard: Messages sent through the widget (widget.globo.support) are seamlessly integrated into the Globo.support’s dasbhoard app.globo.support. WordPress site owners will receive these messages on app.globo.support and will be able to manage conversations and interactions from a centralized location.

Learn More:
Explore the full suite of Globo.support features by visiting our landing page globo.support and main app at app.globo.support.

Privacy policy

Features

  • Easy integration of the Globo Widget chat into your website.
  • Provide real-time customer support to your users.
  • Customize the appearance and behavior of the chat widget.

Installation

  1. Install the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress and activate.
  2. Configure the Globo Widget settings in the plugin’s Globo settings page.

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: How do I configure the Globo Widget settings?
A: After activating the plugin, navigate to the ‘Globo Settings’ page in the WordPress admin area. Enter your Globo Website ID and customize the chat widget’s appearance and behavior.

Q: Where can I find my Globo Website ID?
A: Your Globo Website ID can be obtained from your app.globo.support account. Log in to your app.globo.support dashboard and navigate to Settings page to find your unique Website ID.

Changelog

1.0

  • Initial release.

Upgrade Notice

1.0

Initial release of the Globo Widget Integration plugin.
